amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.para: The authority may mortgage all or any portion of any project or any other facilities conveyed to the authority for such purpose and the site or sites thereof, whether presently owned or subsequently acquired, for the benefit of the holders of the bonds of the authority issued to finance such project or any portion thereof or issued to refund or refinance outstanding indebtedness or to reimburse an endowment or any similar fund of a private institution of higher education as permitted by the Nebraska Educational Finance Authority Act.
